main.name: Cameron Sickler
main.bio: I hope you are enjoying my portfolio so far! Coding is hobby I noticed as an undergraduate and pursued a few years after joining the workforce. I used my knowledge as a coder in conjunction with the resources provided by the coding community to put together this website. My goal with this site is to demonstrate my coding knowledge while simultanously educating you about my professional work experience. Please take some time to view the information I provided and thank you for stopping in!
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you have any questions!

education.school: University of Wisconsin Extended Campus System

Major: Organizational Communication Minor: Information Systems.

testimonials.text: What a great portfolio. I'd really like to reach out to this guy to discuss career opportunities.
testimonials.user: The person reading this quote right now

testimonials.text: I've know this guy for a long time and I can say he's definately looking for work and worth interviewing.
